BBBuzz: Values for buzzer. On or Off
BBMode:
Update mode for LEDs
setting to Manual requires show LED changes blocks
setting to Auto will update the LEDs everytime they change
BBModel:
Model Types of BitBot
Classic or XL
bitbot.BBBias: Set left/right bias to match motors
bitbot.BBBias|param|bias: percentage of speed to bias with eg: 10
bitbot.BBBias|param|direction: direction to turn more (if robot goes right, set this to left)
bitbot.BBModels:
Get numeric value of BitBot Model
* @param model BitBot Model eg: BBModel.Classic
bitbot.bb360Servo: Set speed and direction for continuous rotation Servos on P1 and P2 (XL Only)
bitbot.bb360Servo|param|servo: servo to control. P1 or P2
bitbot.bbEnableBluetooth: Enable/Disable Bluetooth support by disabling/enabling FireLeds
bitbot.bbServoDeadband: Set deadband for continuous rotation Servos on P1 and P2 (XL Only)
bitbot.bbServoDeadband|param|deadband: speed below which servos are off eg: 5
bitbot.bbServoTrim: Set trim for continuous rotation Servos on P1 and P2 (XL Only)
bitbot.bbServoTrim|param|servo: servo to slow down. P1 or P2
bitbot.bbSetServo: Position Servos on P1 and P2 (XL Only)
bitbot.bbSetServo|param|degrees: Degrees to turn servo (0 to 180). eg: 90
bitbot.bbSetServo|param|servo: servo to control. P1 or P2
bitbot.bbStopServos: Disable servos (Talon for both Classic & XL, P1 and P2 for XL only)
bitbot.bitBrightness: Set the brightness of the BitFace
bitbot.bitBrightness|param|brightness: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 40
bitbot.convertRGB: Convert from RGB values to colour number
bitbot.drive: Drive robot forward (or backward) at speed.
bitbot.driveMilliseconds: Drive robot forward (or backward) at speed for milliseconds.
bitbot.driveMilliseconds|param|milliseco: duration in milliseconds to drive forward for, then stop. eg: 400
bitbot.driveMilliseconds|param|speed: speed of motor between -1023 and 1023. eg: 600
bitbot.driveTurn: Turn robot in direction at speed.
bitbot.driveTurnMilliseconds: Spin robot in direction at speed for milliseconds.
bitbot.driveTurnMilliseconds|param|milli: duration in milliseconds to turn for, then stop. eg: 400
bitbot.driveTurnMilliseconds|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 1023. eg: 600
bitbot.driveTurn|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 1023. eg: 600
bitbot.drive|param|speed: speed of motor between -1023 and 1023. eg: 600
bitbot.getModel: get Model of BitBot (Classic or XL)
bitbot.go: Move robot forward (or backward) at speed.
bitbot.goms: Move robot forward (or backward) at speed for milliseconds
bitbot.goms|param|milliseconds: duration in milliseconds to drive forward for, then stop. eg: 400
bitbot.goms|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 100. eg: 60
bitbot.go|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 100. eg: 60
bitbot.ledBrightness: Set the brightness of the LEDs
bitbot.ledBrightness|param|brightness: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 40
bitbot.ledRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all LEDs.
bitbot.ledShift: Shift LEDs forward and clear with zeros.
bitbot.matBrightness: Set the brightness of the Matrix
bitbot.matBrightness|param|brightness: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 40
bitbot.matRainbow: Shows a rainbow pattern on all Matrix LEDs
bitbot.matShowEyeball: Shows an Eyeball on the Matrix
bitbot.matShowEyeball|param|pos: position of pupil (up, down, left, etc)
bitbot.matShowEyeball|param|size: size of pupil. Small or Large
bitbot.matShowImage: Shows an Image on the Matrix
bitbot.move: Move individual motors forward or reverse
bitbot.move|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 100. eg: 60
bitbot.oledCircle|param|update: set true to show immediately on screen. Requires updateOled otherwise. eg: true
bitbot.oledLine: draw a line from x1,y1 to x2,y2
bitbot.oledLine|param|update: set true to show immediately on screen. requires updateOled otherwise. eg: true
bitbot.oledNumber|param|inv: inverse or normal text eg: false
bitbot.oledPlotPixel|param|update: set true to show immediately on screen. requires updateOled otherwise. eg: true
bitbot.oledRectangle|param|update: set true to show immediately on screen. requires updateOled otherwise. eg: true
bitbot.oledSet: Set Oled all White or all Black
bitbot.oledSet|param|set: all OLED pixels on or off. eg: false
bitbot.oledText|param|inv: inverse or normal text eg: false
bitbot.rotate: Rotate robot in direction at speed
bitbot.rotatems: Rotate robot in direction at speed for milliseconds.
bitbot.rotatems|param|milliseconds: duration in milliseconds to spin for, then stop. eg: 400
bitbot.rotatems|param|speed: speed of motor between 0 and 100. eg: 60
bitbot.select_model: Force Model of BitBot (Determines Pins used)
bitbot.select_model|param|model: Model of BitBot; Classic or XL
bitbot.setArrayPixel: Set x, y position to a given color
bitbot.setArrayPixel|param|x: left/right position of the LED (0 to 4). Left is 0
bitbot.setArrayPixel|param|y: up/down position of the LED (0 to 4). Top is 0
bitbot.setBitEye: Set BitFace eye(s) to selected colour
bitbot.setBitMouth: Set BitFace mouth to selected style and colour
bitbot.setBitNose: Set BitFace nose to selected colour
bitbot.setBitface: Sets all Bitface LEDs to a given color
bitbot.setLedColor: Sets all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
bitbot.setMatrix: Sets all Matrix LEDs to a given color
bitbot.setPixel: Set single Matrix LED to a given color
bitbot.setPixelColor:
Set single LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
* @param ledId position of the LED (0 to 11)
bitbot.setPixel|param|ledId: linear position of the LED (0 to 24)
bitbot.setTalon|param|degrees: Degrees to open Talon (0 to 80). eg: 30
bitbot.setUpdateMode: Set LED update mode (Manual or Automatic)
bitbot.setUpdateMode|param|updateMode: setting automatic will show LED changes automatically
bitbot.sonar: Read distance from sonar module connected to accessory connector.
bitbot.stop: Stop robot by coasting slowly to a halt or braking
